name: admin.usergroups.listChannels
desc: List the channels linked to an org-level IDP group (user group).

include_num_members.desc: Flag to include or exclude the count of members per channel.

usergroup_id.desc: ID of the IDP group to list default channels for.

errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this workspace.
errors.invalid_auth: The workspace specified is not part of this Enterprise organization.
errors.invalid_user: The calling user is not valid.
errors.not_allowed: The calling user is not an admin or does not have necessary role
errors.not_an_admin: The token provided is not associated with an Org Admin or Owner.
errors.not_an_enterprise: The token passed in does not belong to an Enterprise organization.
errors.usergroup_not_found: The IDP group provided was not found.
errors.usergroup_not_linked_to_team: The IDP group provided is not linked to the specified workspace.
